suggestion.no-recommendations: Follow some users to get recommendations!

error.login: Sorry, your username or password was incorrect. Please try again.

modal-title.delete-account: Sure you want to delete your account?

modal-content.delete-post: This can’t be undone and it will be removed from your profile. the timeline of any accounts that follow you, and from Twitter search results.
modal-content.unfollow: Their Tweets will no longer show up in your home timeline. You can still view their profile, unless their Tweets are protected.
modal-content.delete-account: This can’t be undone and it will be removed from your profile. ?
modal-content.logout: You can always log back in at any time.
